duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the Store Manager with oversight of the Station Store operations, including hiring, supervising, and working with the staff to accomplish daily tasks, bookkeeping, and merchandising.
Maintain high standards and provide fast and friendly service to customers, while overseeing the execution of the food program.
Lead a team of employees and management, recruit, interview, hire, delegate, and follow up on tasks.
Plan, organize, communicate plans and ideas, and handle cash-handling and bookkeeping.
Advocate and empathize with staff, solve problems, and ensure safety and security measures are in place.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent plus 6 months to 1 year of retail and management work experience preferred.
Valid driver’s license and dependable transportation.
